scripts.start: npm run build:local && NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config config/local/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --config config/dev/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:stage: npm run build:stage && NODE_ENV=test webpack-dev-server --config config/stage/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production webpack-dev-server --config config/prod/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:local: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development webpack --config config/local/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=development webpack --config config/dev/webpack.config.ts --env development
scripts.build:stage: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=test webpack --config config/stage/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config config/prod/webpack.config.ts
